passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > article > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div > h2

html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > article > div > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)

html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > article > div > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(3) > h2:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > aside > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > aside > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > aside > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > aside > div:nth-child(4) > div > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > aside > div:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(1) > h5:nth-child(1)

nodes.html: 天地人文創，臺灣知名文創暨教育培訓機構，品牌概念源於易經，以推動產業文創化為使命，經營涵蓋教育培訓、空間運營、專案策展、媒體經營等。旗下天地人學堂舉辦各產業專業課程培訓、講座與研討會，提供企業顧問、知識解決方案，協助企業轉型、成長、開創新商機。天地人擁有超過1,000位以上之各領域專精業師，每年公開舉辦超過600場專業課程，課程由各業總經理、總監、上市櫃公司高階主管、會計師、律師、藝術家等業師親授課程。合作對象包含臺灣千大企業、外商公司、中小企業、基金會協會、政府部門與NPO、NGO，提供專業、專屬與多元的培訓計畫與方案。
